name: SleepTales-RelaxingBedtimeStoriesforAll
0:
”Alexa, open sleep tales”
”Alexa, ask sleep tales to play random”
”Alexa, ask sleep tales to play Beauty and the Beast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep tales
des:
Get the best sleep of your life with Sleep Tales!

Sleep Tales are a unique combination of sleep-inducing bedtime stories with soothing background sounds to help you drift off to sleep and stay asleep.

Join the tens of thousands of users falling asleep every night to our sleep skills!

HOW TO USE:

Play a random tale:

Alexa, open Sleep Tales
Play Random

Play a specific tale:

Alexa open Sleep Tales
Play The Gift of the Magi

Get a list of available categories:

Alexa, open Sleep Tales
List Categories

Get a list of available Sleep Tales:

Alexa, open Sleep Tales
List tales

FREE TALES

Beauty and the Beast
Robinson Crusoe
Amboseli
A Day on the Bay
The Velveteen Rabbit

PREMIUM TALES:

Premium Members get access to additional Sleep Tales. ( We will be adding new Sleep Tales every couple of weeks )

Rikki Tikki Tavi
The Ocean Villa
The Gift of the Magi
The Ugly Duckling
Rapunzel
Sleeping Beauty
The Emporor's New Clothes
Jack and the Beanstalk
The Sierra Nevada
The Norka
The Birds of Yosemite
The Dragon Tamers
The Little Mermaid
The Nightingale
The Tinderbox
The Beetle
The Golden Branch
The Remarkable Rocket
The Little Good Mouse
Goldenberry
A Safe Space
The Road Home
Monet et Giverny
Taking Flight
The Gulf of Poets
Napa
A Day on the Bay

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT:

We hope you'll love Sleep Tales and give us a review. If you feel that Sleep Tales can be improved in any way, please let us know at support@sleepsounds.io and we'll do everything in our power to make it better.

We'd love to hear from you! If you have questions, comments, or feedback, please e-mail us at support@sleepsounds.io.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
